title: Glendorgal Club
desc: Catering to the aspirations of its moneyed clientele, this fancy pants club features an expansive area filled with pool tables, as well as individual rooms devoted to snooker, billiards, chess, squash, table tennis, golf simulator, and a minimalist workout-machine area.燗fter the exercise, relax in the coffee shop, wine lounge or cigar lounge.
